## Funkcija `optim`


```{r}
sumsq <- function(par,x,y
                  ){
  a <- par[1]
  b <- par[2]
  yhat <- a+b*x
  d2 <- sum((y-yhat)^2)
  return(d2)
}
```


Podatki
```{r}
n <- 10
a <- 1
b <- 3
serr <- 1
x <- rnorm(n)
eps <- rnorm(n,sd = serr)
y <- a + b * x + eps
plot(x,y)
X <- x
Y <- y
rm(x)
```

Optimizacija

```{r}
optim(par=c(0,1),sumsq,x=X,y=Y)
lm(y~X)
```
